title: Riot you've made a slight mistake with the duskblade changes
body: If a draven can rush Duskblade first item and deal 80% of someones health in one auto (With 90 armor) then somethings wrong. I also witnessed a video of another draven one shotting an ashe with it, I'm assuming the passive true damage change is the cause?

replies.body: it wouldn't be league of legends if every couple of months draven wasn't unstoppable
It wouldn't be Riot if their "Balancing" made something worse then it was before.
